Glenn MARCUS, petitioner,
v.

No. 12-10571.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 7, 2013.
Case below, 517 Fed.Appx. 8.
Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
Justice SOTOMAYOR and Justice KAGAN took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
